info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 15 at 3:01PM PST until November 15 at 5:00PM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues.
* WHERE...A portion of southern California, including the following county, San Bernardino.
* WHEN...Until 500 PM PST.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 301 PM PST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.25 and 0.75 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Barstow, Daggett, Owl Canyon Campground, Lenwood and Nebo Center. - This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 in California between mile markers 81 and 88. Interstate 40 in California between mile markers 1 and 15. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON
